entity.name: VRapeutic Inc.
entity.description: VRapeutic is a deep-tech company specializing in immersive therapy and education for underserved populations. With a track record in VR-powered rehabilitation and digital health, VRapeutic is now expanding into AI-powered inclusive virtual STEM education.

projects.name: Yosqel--Generative AI-Powered Virtual School Labs for Girls & Women Educators
projects.description: A scalable, headset-agnostic platform delivering immersive STEM lab experiences to underserved African communities. It integrates VR, LLMs, and LMMs to support both learners and educators.
